name: Roman Developer Build 01
description: This is the first developer build of the game Roman : The Lost Adventures. Please comment and tell me about what do u think of this project so far. This is a project with no fundings. In this developer build of the game u can test out the first demo level and check out the core mechanics of this game. If u can, please donate to this project and its recent builds. I'm making this game's dev builds public for everyone to play so I can make everyone join the  adventure of us making this game from zero to 100 :) Please comment below your suggestions and opinions below. I would really appreciate that.
